pages.text: Sore de torinasu mono no torinashi mo, kare-ra ni yakudatanaidearou
一体訓戒 Kara somuki saru to wa, kare-ra wa dō shita nodearou
Kare-ra wa chōdo shishi o mite kyōfu ni ochītta roba no yō ni
ichimokusan ni nigedasu ka no yōdeatta
Iya, kare-ra wa sorezore aka reta shokan ga sadzuke rareru koto o nozonde iru
Iya danjite sōde wanai. Kare-ra wa raise o osorete inai nodearu
Iya, kore wa masani kunkaidearu
Dakara dare demo hossuru mono ni wa, sore o kimo ni meiji sase nasai
Daga, arrā ga nozoma reru mono no soto wa, ryūi shinaidearou. Kare wa kashiko rubeki okata yoku yurushite kudasa reru okatadearu
Watashi wa, fukkatsu no hi ni oite chikau
Mata, jiseki suru tamashī ni oite chikau
Ningen wa, ware ga kare no hone o atsume rarenai to kangaeru no ka
Iya, ware wa kare no yubisaki (no hone) made soroeru koto ga dekiru nodearu
Daga ningen wa, kare no gozen (no seikatsu) ni oite mo, tsumiwookasu koto o nozomu
Kare wa,`fukkatsu no hi wa itsuka.' To tou
Tsuini megakuramu-ji
tsuki wa 蝕 Keri
taiyō to tsuki wa awase rareru
Sonohi ningen wa,`doko ni hinan shiyou ka.' To iu
Danjite yoke rarenai nodearu
Anata no omo no omoto ga, sonohi sadame no sumaidearu
Sonohi (subete no) ningen wa, sudeni itta koto to,-go ni nokoshita koto ni tsuite kaku-ge rarerudearou
Iya ningen wa, jibun jishin ni taishi shōnindearu
Tatoe kare ga, iroiro benkai shite mo
Kono (kuruān o saisoku suru tame ni) anata no shita o isogashi ku ugokashite wa naranai
Sore o atsume, sore o yoma seru no wa, ware no shigotodearu
Sorede ware ga sore o yonda toki, sono dokuju ni shitagae
Sarani sore o tokiakasu no mo, hontōni ware no shigotodearu
